# Campaign Orchestration

## Overview
Run integrated campaigns with anchor content, landing pages, emails, ads, and socialâ€”then measure everything.

## When to Use
- You need an end-to-end plan across channels
- You want consistent execution with clear measurement

## Trigger Phrases
- "orchestrate campaign" "integrated campaign" "go-to-market run"

## What it Contains
- Asset map and dependencies
- Channel plan and timing
- QA and measurement gates

## Workflow
1) Brief: objectives, audience, offer
2) Assets:
- Content: seo-workflow-orchestration
- Landing: landing-page-copy
- Emails: email-campaign-automation
- Social: social-campaign-orchestration
- Ads: ad-copywriting
3) QA: validation, tone, schema, links
4) Distribute
5) Measure: unified-analytics (exec summary + funnel + attribution)
